title: sukhamE parama
sahitya:
sukhamE parama sukham Om shuddhOham shuddhOham shuddhOham engira


anupallavi

  ihattirkkum parattirkkum maghattirkkum kaDattirkkum Eka cidAkAsha yOga vaibhOgamAm


caraNam    sikkinri mugguNa cETTai iDarinri jIva paramAtma divya kalyANamonri pakkuvamAga 
jnAnap-paDiyETrik-koDiyETri parama shuddhAnandam pAlikkum adhyAtma
